title: DataStax's Apache Cassandra & DSE C# Hour - Ep 5
description:
In this episode Adron covers a range of topics around C#. First a quick review of upcoming shows on our Twitch channel. With that wrapped up he covers the https://dotnetfiddle.net/ web app that can be used to prototype C# code, and even port it to VB.NET and or VB.NET to C#.

Adron then reviews the SchemaMigrationsExplorations project and the code - both C# and CQL - of what was covered in previous episodes. Then after walking through that makes the determination to start building an Apache Cassandra & DataStax Enterprise schema migration tool in C#. The remainder of the episode he then steps through the inception of this project, adding the appropriate projects and everything that is needed to get started coding. In addition, covering some basic user application stories to work against while building the application.

 -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxadevs
